entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Lethbridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:28 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lethbridge Airport 1:41 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -15.2°C
Wind: N 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023
